description.en:
After Xu Shenzhen's family went bankrupt by the scheme of other, desperate to pay her debt she sold herself to Li Jun Chen, throwing her pride away in the middle of the night when the rain and snow scattered.  
Follow Shenzhen as she avenge her family and maybe fall in love?

A novice cook with a thuggish face joins a wizard’s restaurant!
Novice cook Onijima, who was transported to another world after being run over by a truck, ends up working and living in a restaurant run by the strongest wizard in the world.
A fantasy story about working in another world, unfolded with the help of a merry band of demi-human colleagues!

She was kidnapped by a man all over the city! "Hey, give me a baby…" This black belly prince madly pets the young wife.  
–  
She encountered him by mistake but now he won't let her get away that easily. And he seems to be a real prince?!
description.tr: Şehrin her yerinde bir adam tarafından kaçırıldı! “Hey, bana bir bebek ver…” Bu kara göbekli prens genç karısını çılgınca okşuyor.–Yanlışlıkla onunla karşılaştı ama şimdi onun bu kadar kolay kaçmasına izin vermeyecek. Ve gerçek bir prens gibi mi görünüyor?!

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

Having lost his money, lover, and future, a man who has given up on everything finds himself reincarnated in the kingdom of Altodestenia. He, Lectival, has no memories prior to being saved by Meriela, the daughter of an aristocrat, and now finds himself rising up to save the kingdom in its current crisis.

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

title.en: Using My Cooking Skills in a Murim World

altTitles.en: A Bowl of Black Bean Noodles Would Be Served by the Son-in-Law of Zhuge Family

description.en:
With a dream to become the ultimate Chinese cuisine chef, our protagonist finds himself inexplicably transported to the Song Dynasty in China! However, upon awakening, he discovers that he possesses no martial arts skills whatsoever. All that remains are the culinary techniques he mastered in his previous life. Surprisingly, these dishes… receive an overwhelmingly positive response!

Can he, with a single bowl of Jjajangmyeon, truly conquer the martial world?
Will he be able to captivate the Central Plains with his Jjajangmyeon and lead a successful second life in this era?

Nijimi-san is an ordinary high school girl, except her hair changes color based on her mood. Her classmate has cataloged most of her color changes, but there’s one color which is still a mystery to him…
___
[Alt Official Raw](https://twitter.com/search?q=from%3A%40Araragi_Nana_23%20%E3%82%AB%E3%83%A9%E3%83%BC%E3%83%81%E3%82%A7%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B8&src=typed_query&f=live)

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.

description.de:
Ein gut aussehender, narzisstischer Adliger verliebt sich in eine hübsche, zuvorkommende Bürgerliche — so sollte zumindest der ursprüngliche Plot aussehen. Als eine normale Schülerin jedoch als Nebenfigur in ihrem Lieblingsroman aufwacht, ändert sich die Handlung, weil die Hauptfigur des Romans, Herzog Zeronis de Ingrid, ein Auge auf sie geworfen hat! Kann Ripley die ursprüngliche Handlung bewahren, während sie die Avancen des Herzogs ablehnt und versucht, den Machenschaften der Schurkin nicht zum Opfer zu fallen?

---

description.en:
Due to a mistake one night, I became the target of the most obsessive man and a villainess!

After possessing Ripley, a count’s daughter and an extra in a novel, I became the female lead. Since this is the case, I will try to enjoy the riches and luxuries of a nobleman that I couldn’t experience in my past life.

I can remember up to drinking alone in a corner at a party… but I woke up the next day in the male lead’s bed!

Ripley became the target of the villainess after the male lead’s remarks that she should be responsible for spending their first night together. Knowing the fate of the female lead, Ripley tries to get rid of the male lead by causing trouble, not washing, and all sorts of things. Nevertheless, the male lead’s unwavering single-minded heart begins to shake.

*Based on the webnovel written by HWANG DoTol with insert art by MSG.*

---
A handsome, selfish noble falls for a beautiful, kind commoner -- at least, that’s how the story’s supposed to go. When an average college student wakes up as Ripley, an extra in her favorite romance novel, she resolves to enjoy the luxuries of her character’s status while watching the novel's plot unfold from the sidelines. However, her plans are soon derailed when she finds herself in bed with no other than Duke Zeronis, the novel’s hero! Dodging the villainess’ schemes, the Duke’s advances, and her own feelings, can Ripley keep the story on track and survive beyond the first night?

---

description.es:
Un noble guapo y egoísta se enamora de una plebeya hermosa y sensible... Así debería ser la historia, ¿no? Un día, una estudiante universitaria se despierta en el cuerpo de Ripley, un personaje secundario de su novela romántica favorita, y decide que lo mejor será disfrutar de los lujos de esta nueva vida mientras observa cómo se desarrolla la trama. Sin embargo, sus planes se arruinan cuando, al día siguiente, amanece en la cama junto al duque Zeronis, el protagonista de la novela. Entre las estratagemas de la villana, los avances del duque y sus propios sentimientos, ¿podrá Ripley mantenerse al margen de la historia? ¿Sobrevivirá a esa primera noche?

description.ru:
После реинкарнации в Рипли, дочь графа из романа, я стала главной героиней. Я постараюсь насладиться богатством и роскошью дворянки, так как в прошлой жизни не могла этого делать. Помню, как одна пила на вечеринке… но на следующий день я проснулась в чужой постели!
Рипли стала мишенью злодея после замечаний главного героя, что она должна понести ответственность за проведение их первой ночи вместе. Зная судьбу главной героини, Рипли пытается избавиться от него, создавая разные проблемы. Тем не менее непоколебимое сердце главного героя начинает дрожать.

Yakışıklı ve bencil bir asil, güzel ve kibar bir sıradan insandan hoşlanır -- en azından, hikaye böyle devam etmelidir. Ortalama bir üniversite öğrencisi, en sevdiği romantik romanın bir ek karakteri olan Ripley olarak uyandığında kenardan romanın olay örgüsünün gelişmesini izlerken karakterinin statüsünün getirdiği lükslüğün tadını çıkarmaya karar verir. Ancak, kendisini romanın kahramanı Dük Zeronis ile yatakta bulduğunda planları kısa sürede raydan çıkar! Kötü karakterlerin entrikalarından, Dük'ün yakınlaşma çabalarından ve kendi hislerinden kaçan Ripley, hikayeyi yoluna koyabilecek ve ilk gecenin ötesinde hayatta kalabilecek midir?

---

description.vi:
Ripley - người mà nữ chính xuyên không vào là con gái của một nhà Bá tước, đồng thời cũng là cái bóng đèn quần chúng rực rỡ của cuốn tiểu thuyết "Đoá hoa của Elonell".

Đã quần chúng lại còn rực rỡ là nói thú vui tao nhã của tác giả cuốn sách =)) author phát cuồng với nhân vật tóc vàng mắt xanh nên từ chính phụ đến làm nền, bẻ sang boss cuối đều chung một style nốt. Những người có màu tóc màu mắt không thuộc dạng phong trào yellow blue thì xác định là bóng đèn con ghẻ say đ*o có đất diễn.

Về nguyên tác câu chuyện gốc, nam chính là Công tước trẻ tuổi nhất đế chế, đồng thời cũng là pay-lắk boi dở hơi nhưng được cái đẹp mã nên hút fan zl, tóm lại mọi lời thoại tả về ổng đều kiểu:" Chechow-er được mỗi cái mặt". Trái ngược hoàn toàn với nam chính Công tước, nữ chính Etolie là con gái nuôi của nhà Nam tước, công dung ngôn hạnh không thiếu nửa phần, đích thị là "con nhà người ta ver tiểu thuyết"
description.zh:
穿越后竟成了女配？
杯具啊为什么不是女主！
一瞬间穿越到小说里，成为了名字都记不清的女配。本想尽情享受奢华生活，可是穿越第二天，我就不小心夺走了某人的初夜。问题在于，那人竟然是小说里的头号执着男，男一号！

我穿越到小說裡，變成了連名字都不太記得的小配角。但好歹是個貴族，在小說結局前就盡情享受幸福的生活吧!然而事與願違，才穿越第二天，我就睡了小說裡佔有欲最強的男主角! 「既然男女共度了初夜，當然就要對彼此負責吧?」

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!

Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

altTitles.en: To Another World on my Own!
Go to A Different World On Your Own!
Going to Another World on Your Own!

altTitles.ja: 自力で異世界へ！ ～優しい仲間と一緒に異世界生活を満喫します～

description.en: Tarou Satu, a young man who longed for an otherworldly adventure since a child and devoted his youth to finding it, finally goes to another world on his own. However, things did not go well for him, as his previous life’s memories were about to be erased by God. Despite that, he almost dies during his reincarnation process, which allows him to fulfil the condition for a special ability and luckily, keep his old memories. From there, the now reincarnated Tauro Satu, grows up by using his brains and efforts while gradually developing his mysterious skill, Garbled Text, which everyone thought to be completely useless.

title.en: The Strongest Chef in Another World

description.en: Kang Taeyang, a chef who chased his dreams. One day, he lost everything due to a single choice. But an opportunity came to Taeyang, who was spending hopeless days working odd jobs. [Aurora is hiring employees.] A single line of text changed everything for him!

Kala Maharani is an ordinary girl who’s always restrained by her father. One day, she chose to run away from home to celebrate the new year 2014 in Bali. But who would have thought that she drowned in the sea and was saved by her friend who told her seven years have passed. What will happen? What about her family and friends? Can she go back to her original timeline?
description.id: Kala Maharani adalah seorang gadis biasa yang sering dikekang oleh ayahnya. Suatu saat, dia memilih kabur dari rumah untuk merayakan tahun baru 2014 di Bali. Namun, siapa sangka, dia tenggelam di laut dan diselamatkan oleh temannya yang bilang kalau waktu sudah berlalu sekitar tujuh tahun. Apa yang terjadi? Bagaimana dengan keluarganya dan sahabat-sahabatnya? Bisakah dia kembali lagi ke masanya?

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

13-year old Rachel awakens to find herself trapped in the basement of an abandoned building. Without any memories, or even a clue as to where she could be, she wanders the building, lost and dizzy. In her search, she comes across a man covered in bandages. He introduces himself as Zack and he wields a grim-reaper like sickle. A strange bond is struck between them, strengthened by strange, crazy promises… These two, trapped in this strange building, don't know why fate has placed them there. But they will work together desperately to find a way out…
description.pt: Rachel, de 13 anos, acorda e se encontrar presa no porão de um prédio abandonado. Sem lembranças, ou mesmo uma pista de onde poderia estar, ela vaga pelo edifício, perdida e tonta. Em sua busca, encontra um homem coberto de bandagens. Ele apresenta-se como Zack e maneja uma foice como um ceifador. Um elo estranho é criado entre eles, fortalecido por promessas estranhas e loucas… Esses dois, presos neste estranho edifício, não sabem por que o destino os colocou lá. Mas eles vão trabalhar juntos desesperadamente para encontrar uma saída…
description.ru:
13-летняя девочка, Рейчел Гарднер, просыпается в странном месте под землей. Она помнит, как шла в больницу, но совсем не понимает, как оказалась здесь. В здании Рейчел встречает серийного маньяка Зака. Лишившаяся желания жить Рей умоляет Зака убить ее. Они заключают сделку, по условиям которой Рейчел должна вывести Зака на поверхность, а Зак взамен за это убьет ее. Рей и Заку предстоит пройти 6 этажей для достижения своей цели. На каждом этаже их поджидает Хозяин этажа, и у каждого Хозяина свои тараканы, цели и планы. Какие же опасности ждут напарников по неволе в жуткой "игре"?  
  
Манга выпущена по одноименной РПГ-игре в жанре хоррор.

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Striving for the Luxury Liner!! Get that Rich Isekai Life with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

altTitles.th: เรื่องวุ่นๆ กับมนุษย์เหมียวๆ

description.en:
A heartwarming story about the daily lives of a freeter named Yuuya and his two little pets.  
  
Note: Chapters follow the Tankouban (book) order and numbering. The chapter number in (Ex Ch. No.) specifies the original chapter number (when first released on HanaLala Online & MangaPark) before the chapters were compiled into the book.

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AC%E3%81%93%E3%81%A5%E3%81%91!)
An ordinary girl stumbles on an injured black dog one day on her way home and decides to take him with her. But, when she falls asleep, the dog turns into a handsome man! What will happen next?!

title.en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken - Yuusha Avan to Gokuen no Maou

description.en: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

title.en: Rettougan no Tensei Majutsushi - Shiitagerareta Moto Yuusha wa Mirai no Sekai o Yoyuu de Ikinuku (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.ja: 劣等眼の転生魔術師 ~虐げられた元勇者は未来の世界を余裕で生き抜く~ (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Magician With Inferior Eyes ~The Oppressed Ex-hero Survives the Future World With Ease~

description.en: In a world where eye color determines one’s magical prowess, there existed a mage of unparalleled might, Abel. Feared even by allies, he transfers his soul to the distant future in search of an ideal realm. Yet, in this new era, his once-celebrated eyes are dubbed “Inferior Eyes” and he becomes the butt of ridicule. Harassed by high-borne nobles and unjustly discriminated against, Abel discovers that while magic has diminished in this technologically advanced future, his Amber Eyes conceal a power beyond human comprehension. This hero from the past is set to revolutionize the magic of the future!

One day, a friend who was like a sister to me confessed that she was pregnant with my husband's child. "Congratulate me, Ariana." A friend who brazenly demanded a blessing instead of feeling sorry. "Don't talk nonsense. Do you think divorce is an option?" A shameless husband who became a Count as a result of a marriage of convenience. Although I chose a strategic marriage to solve the family's debts,
I had worked so hard for this marriage... 'Divorce is the only option without a second thought.' The problem is the marriage contract with my husband.
If I file for divorce first, the penalty is a whopping 500 billion won! The only thing I inherited from my father, who poured all his money into preventing the outflow of cultural assets, is a keen eye for beauty. It's a moment that requires an extraordinary divorce strategy! "Just wait, Rowen. You'll fall in a way that your poor imagination couldn't even conceive."

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

description.en: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

title.en: Ore Dake 2-Shuume Gachizei - Tsuyo Sugite Game Balance wo Hakai Shita

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ2周目ガチ勢～強すぎてゲームバランスを破壊した～

altTitles.en: The Only New Game+ Hardcore Gamer ~I'm So Overpowered, I Shattered the Game's Balance~

description.en:
Rise to the top with knowledge and skills in your second life!

Former pro gamer Itsuki, who concealed his controversial past and worked as a VTuber, is attacked by problematic fans after getting doxxed, resulting in an accident that makes him lose consciousness. He wakes up only to find himself 10 years in the past, right after the launch of the hugely popular VRMMO Metasense!

There’s no need to hide his past in this world. Equipped with knowledge and skills from his first playthrough, becoming a top gamer and streamer is effortless!

I… will stand at the pinnacle of Metasense!

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

title.en: Kenja no Deshi wo Nanoru Kenja

altTitles.ja: 賢者の弟子を名乗る賢者 THE COMIC

altTitles.en: She Professed Herself Pupil of the Wise Man

altTitles.fr: Enchantée, je suis la disciple du Sage !

altTitles.id: Dia Mengakui Dirinya Murid Orang Bijak!

description.en:
In one of the worlds that exist within virtual reality, Kagami held the title of one of the Nine Sages, a position that placed him at the pinnacle of magicians. One day, he fell asleep in-game after pulling an all-nighter. When he opened his eyes, what he found was a world that was different to the one before… More important than anything else, was that the grizzled and dignified veteran’s body that he was used to, had now turned into an innocent little girl’s. If his true identity was leaked, honestly speaking it was a situation where it was very possible that the solemn image he had built up until now would be destroyed. And to deal with this problem, the excuse that he came up with was…


---

description.fr:
Dans un des mondes de la réalité virtuelle, Kagami possède le titre d’un des Neuf Sages, le plaçant au sommet de tous les magiciens. Un jour, il s’endort pendant une session de nuit en pleine partie. Lorsqu’il ouvre les yeux, il découvre un monde différent de celui qu’il connait… Et bien plus important, son avatar, un vieux sage vétéran et à l’air digne, a été remplacé par une petite fille. Si sa véritable identité venait à être révélée, l’image qu’il a mis tant de temps à se créer auprès des gens serait détruite. Pour remédier à cela, l’excuse qu’il a trouvé est…


---
description.ja: とあるオンラインゲームの九賢者の一人、召喚士ダンブルフこと咲森鑑はある日ゲームが現実となった世界へ飛ばされてしまう。しかも老練な賢者の姿ではなく可憐な少女の姿で。築き上げた賢者の威厳を守るためにも賢者の弟子「ミラ」と名乗ることになる。

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

description.en:
The Yakuza boss is... a cat!? The "brown tiger" group boss, Oyaji. Yanagi, the new recruit in the Yakuza, and the gang members are once again at the mercy of the carefree Oyaji today... But it's not that bad.
A lively comedy about a cat... Begins!!

The title Like a Cat, or Neko ga Gotoku, is a parody of the Yakuza game series' title which is Like a Dragon or Ryu ga Gotoku.
description.pt-br:
O chefe da Yakuza é... um gato!? O chefe do grupo "tigre marrom", Oyaji. 
Yanagi, o novo recruta da Yakuza, e os membros da gangue estão mais uma vez à mercê do despreocupado Oyaji ... Mas não é tão ruim assim.
Uma animada comédia sobre um gato... Começa!!

O título Like a Cat, ou Neko ga Gotoku, é uma paródia do título da série de jogos Yakuza, que é Like a Dragon ou Ryu ga Gotoku.

title.en: Kanojo ga Onii-chan ni Nattara Shitai 10 no Koto

altTitles.ja: 彼女がお兄ちゃんになったらしたい10のこと

description.en: As a result of entering high school, Nanase moves into a sharehome. Only, there is a special rule that states "all the residents must be assigned a family role"!! What will happen of Nanase's life as she starts living with her pretend family...!?

23 year-old Office Lady Akari is looking for a marriage partner, with whom she can have a steady and “normal” married life. While she spends her days hedging risks so as not to become unhappy, she becomes interested in her plain 40 year-old co-worker, Tanaka-san. Judging by her figure, Akari suspects she must be up to something. And that something is… bellydancing! When she discovers Tanaka-san’s secret, Akari becomes a fan of this stoic yet sexy older lady. As a friendship blooms between them, two women chase after their dreams and love.
description.ja: 優秀な経理部員だけどアラフォー地味女の田中さん。婚活に励む23歳OL・朱里は最近そんな田中さんが気になって仕方ない…そしてついに、その素顔はまさかのセクシー○○○〇であることを発見！すっかり田中さんのファンになってしまった朱里は、婚活そっちのけで田中さんの追っかけと化すが…！？朱里の腐れ縁男・進吾や、婚活相手のこじらせ男・笙野、チャラすぎる既婚者・三好…秘密を抱えた田中さんを巡り、5人の「いい大人」がすれ違いまくりの恋を繰り広げる、新境地ドラマです！

description.en: Nagomu Irino returns to his Kyoto home for the first time in ten years when his father is hospitalized. Nagomu is eager to take over Ryokushou, the family's Japanese sweet shop, but he's instead asked to be a father figure to Itsuka Yukihira, the girl everyone calls the successor.

title.en: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef

description.id:
Woojin menyadari kehidupan masa lalunya melalui insiden Monster Gate.
Dia adalah… Heavenly Demon yang menaklukan Dataran Tengah!
Bahkan ketika dia adalah Heavenly Demon, dia memiliki mimpi yang tidak dapat dia capai…
Dia pasti akan mencapainya kali ini.

Impiannya adalah menjadi chef!

altTitles.ja: あつまれ！ふしぎ研究部

description.en: Goryo Daisuke is still unsure about which club to join. When he meets the three girl members of Mysterious Research Club while looking for the school's warehouse, he gets hypnotized to sign the registration form. Suzu who is obsessed with scary curses, Chiaki who only relies on her monstrous strength to perform dangerous magic tricks, and Kotone who can control people by hypnosis.
description.es-la: Goryou Daiseuke aún está indeciso sobre a qué club unirse en su escuela. Cuando conoce a tres chicas miembros del “Club de Investigaciones Misteriosas” mientras buscaba el almacén de la escuela, es hipnotizado por ellas y, sin saberlo, firma una solicitud de ingreso. Suzu, quien está obsesionada con las maldiciones, Chiaki quien confía en su monstruosa fuerza para realizar actos de magia y Kotone, quien puede controlar a la gente con hipnosis. Ahora comienza una nueva y caótica vida para Daisuke, siendo el conejillo de indias del club.
description.pt-br: Goryo Daisuke ainda não sabe ao certo a qual clube ingressar. Quando ele conhece as três garotas do Clube de Pesquisa Misteriosa enquanto procura o depósito da escola, ele fica hipnotizado para assinar o formulário de inscrição. Suzu, que é obcecada por maldições assustadoras, Chiaki, que só conta com sua força monstruosa para realizar truques de mágica perigosos, e Kotone, que pode controlar as pessoas por meio da hipnose.

altTitles.ja: 讐演のアルアビュール

description.en: Alhabor is a revenge drama that depicts the dark side of the entertainment world. The main character, Harumi Kumakawa, used to be an actor, but due to some trouble she left the entertainment industry and now works as a salesperson for a food company. Harumi's passion for acting grows as she watches actors of her generation perform. A mysterious girl, Ao, appears before him. Her appearance was reminiscent of a popular actress in her past who had changed Harumi greatly. Harumi is disturbed by Ao's presence, and Harumi demands that she buy her talent for 30 million yen.
description.pt-br: Alhabor é um drama de vingança que retrata o lado obscuro do mundo do entretenimento. O protagonista, Harumi Kumakawa, era ator, mas por causa de alguns problemas deixou a indústria e agora trabalha como vendedor em uma empresa alimentícia. A paixão de Harumi pela atuação cresce à medida que assiste atores de sua geração se apresentarem. Uma misteriosa garota, Ao, surge diante dele. Sua aparência lembra a de uma atriz popular do passado que marcou muito Harumi. Até que Ao exige que ele compre seu talento por 30 milhões de ienes...

description.en:
Aki's adopted father has been gruesomely murdered, and Aki herself is the main suspect! With nowhere else to turn, Aki must depend on the mysterious Anato Misuto to clear her name.  
  
Shonen Jump Golden Future Cup 2018, Entry #5

A bloodstained man stands in front of a terrified girl. He proclaims his love for her and makes this ominous declaration: A year from now, she will either die with him or will be alone forever. Now, rumors abound about the cursed girl who causes any boy who proclaims his love for her to die. Join us to discover the mysteries of Metronome.

title.en: Marshal, Your Wife Ran Away Again

altTitles.en: Shǎo shuài nǐ lǎopó yòu pǎole
Shao shuai ni laopo you paole
Sergeant, Your Wife Ran Away Again

description.en:
Gu Qiang Zhou returns to the town where her father lives only to avenge her mother. On the course of the story she meets a marshal with whom she has a complicated relationship.

[Bilibili - Alternative Official English](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc472?utm_source=mgd&utm_medium=uploader)

altTitles.ja: ブラッドナイトマーケット

description.en:
Blood Night Street is a town where vampires seeking blood and humans seeking blood buyers gather.
Su Tie, a human who has been branded as an "abolished blood", works for the Blood Control Bureau, an organisation that controls the illegal activities of vampires. One day, Su-Tetsu meets a mysterious vampire, Hyakutori, who claims to be a gastronomist in the city.
A battle suspense of courtship and redemption, spun by a destiny etched in blood, begins.

altTitles.ja: 青春プロタゴニスト 僕たちは恋愛過剰

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Protagonist: Boku-tachi wa Ren'ai Kajou

description.en:
"Every person is the protagonist of his or her own life. But how many of us can truly live. How many of us can truly be the hero of our own lives?" Youth Protagonist.

This is a love story about a high school boy who thinks he is incapable of love for one reason or another, and a girl classmate who falls in love with him.
description.pt-br:
“Cada pessoa é protagonista de sua própria vida. Mas quantos de nós podem viver verdadeiramente? Quantos de nós podem ser verdadeiramente o herói de nossas próprias vidas?” Protagonista Juvenil.

Esta é uma história de amor sobre um estudante do ensino médio que acredita ser incapaz de amar por uma razão ou outra, e uma colega de classe que se apaixona por ele.

title.en: The Demon King Dad and His Hero Daughter

description.en:
Selene, the daughter who dreams of becoming a hero, and Shion, the demon king who adopted her. Shion has to conceal his true identity at all costs, unable to cheer on his daughter’s dreams or attempt to stop her.
This is the story of Selene’s journey to becoming a true hero amidst this dilemma… Or is it the parenting story of the demon king?!

As the distinguished son of a family who run a financial conglomerate, Gatarou Barazono took full advantage of his money to live a rosy life and enjoy it to its fullest. But one day, he suddenly got hit by a truck, and when he awoke, he found himself in the "Afterlife!" There, he finds the dubious-looking "Meiten Restaurant" (Underworld Restaurant), where the deceased are served their final meal before going to rest in peace...

Beings from a different dimension have started a war with mankind. To counter this threat, an academy called "Genetics" that trains female warriors called "Pandora," who can wield special weaponry and armor, was formed. Kazuya Aoi decided to enroll in this school because of a promise with his sister, an outstanding alumnus who died in battle. There he meets second year Satellizer L. Bridgette, nicknamed "The Untouchable Queen" due to her solitary demeanor but also top of her class whose battle simulation streak is undefeated, until he came… and slowly changed her.  
  
The Prequels gives back story to several characters; does not effect the main story.  
  
Most FTH and all LetItGo are joint with Vexed Scans.

There were 33 volumes when the series went on hiatus, however, the site producing the chapters is still ongoing.

title.en: Hazure Skill "Kage ga Usui" o Motsu Guild Shokuin ga, Jitsuha Densetsu no Ansatsusha

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Skill "Kage ga Usui" wo Motsu Guild Shokuin ga, Jitsu wa Densetsu no Ansatsusha

altTitles.en: Hazure Skill: The Guild Member with a Worthless Skill Is Actually a Legendary Assassin
The Guild Official With the Out-of-the-Way Skill "Shadowy" Is, in Fact, the Legendary Assassin
The Guild Official With Weak Skill "Vanish" Is Actually Legendary Assassin

altTitles.ru: В итоге офицер гильдии оказался легендарным убийцей

altTitles.ja: 外れスキル「影が薄い」を持つギルド職員が、実は伝説の暗殺者

altTitles.zh: 拥有开挂技能「薄影」的公会职员原来是传说级别的暗杀者

description.en:
Roland is an assassin who, one day, breaks from his team and single-handedly "kills" the demon king.

After returning to the kingdom, the king graciously promises Roland whatever he wants for his heroics. Conflicted in his desires - he hasn’t thought of anything outside of killing for years - he remembers that one of his teammates told him what she plans to do after evil is defeated: Live an ordinary life.

And so Roland, with his ability to become unnoticeable and the disguised demon king/queen Laila at his side, decides to live a - say it with me - slow life.
description.pt-br: Roland é um assassino que, um dia, rompe com sua equipe e, sozinho, "mata" o rei demônio (que na verdade é uma garota porque você deveria ter descoberto o tipo de história que é agora). Depois de retornar ao reino, o rei graciosamente promete a Roland o que ele quiser para seu heroísmo. Conflito em seus desejos - ele não pensa em nada além de matar por anos - ele lembra que um de seus companheiros de equipe disse a ele o que ela planeja fazer depois que o mal for derrotado: Viver uma vida comum.

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

title.en: Demon King, Your Big Brother Wants You Home for Dinner

altTitles.zh: 魔王大人，你哥喊你回家吃饭

altTitles.zh-ro: Mówáng Dàren, Nǐ Gē Hǎn Nǐ Huíjiā Chīfàn
Mowang Daren, Ni Ge Han Ni Huijia Chifan

description.en: Just imagine~ you’d just become the new demon king, drinking a little wine and singing before unceremoniously being thrown into the human realm. Not only did you lose your mana, you also became a little baby who has to live with a strange family.

1-6. Collecting #1-#6  
A girl collects everything her crush touches; a man keeps a photo album of women giving him blowjobs; schoolboys plays a sexual card game; a lunchbox factory girl collects vomit; a man gathers his missing girlfriend's body parts; a suicidal girl joins a group of women who've made abortion into a grotesque art.  
  
7. Harakiri  
A world where cutting your stomach is the newest fashionable trend among schoolgirls.  
  
8. Holy Night  
Santa is terrorizing the Japanese by flooding everyone with unwanted gifts. The only way to stop him from sending more is to convince him that you're happy with what you've got, or so people think.  
  
9. Voracious Itches  
Putting worms under the skin can be an addictive pleasure.
